Saturday, August 19th, 2017, 1:23:03 AM

"Oo*" mystic Through iridescent dark green haze, you see Limorten swathed in a shroud of ice-fringed dark moonlight. His eyes are pools of swirling grey reminiscent of Lornon's surface. A sickly blood red hue occasionally washes across his ivory skin, which is chiseled with mystical runes glowing with power.

Through iridescent dark green haze, you see Elemental Arcanist of Bloodriven Village with faintly luminous eyes. Lightning-streaked violet gloom twists haphazardly around his dark figure, which is covered in constantly sparking lines of electricity

Through iridescent dark green haze, you see Supernatural Arcanist of Bloodriven Village with faintly luminous eyes. A darkly shaded film bends loosely around his dark figure, which is covered in a glaze of misty, elaborately constructed shapes.
